attributes.action: No More Sharia Law Courts In The UK
attributes.additional_details: There Should Be A Complete Ban Of Sharia Law & its Courts In The UK As There Is No Place In A Western & Mordern Society. As it Is Unfair Not just To Non-Muslims But To Muslims Them Selves Who have Left their Islamic Countries To Avoid Persecution Of Sharia Law & those Who Want A Barbaric Law Should Be Deported From this Country Of Democracy
